lines.text:
[to Detective Strode with Frankie's gun to his head]
So, what's the procedure when you have a gun to your head? What's the fucking procedure when you have a gun to your head?

[singing on the roof]
Frankie wanna blow-up a bank, UH! Frankie wanna rob a bank, UH!
Shit, we're ain't robbing stagecoaches, man! We need something to set it off with.
Cleo, you go to survey the line for the COW.
COW? There's gonna be a cow up in there?

[sighs]
... Stop smoking weed.

[while talking in a parking lot]
Frankie, please! Please, ain't nobody here gonna rob no bank!
No, lets just go in'er and BLOW IT THE FUCK UP!
[laughs loudly]
The only way we gonna see cash is if we take a bank.
Now see I'm with that shit!
Ya'll niggas done lost ya'll mind. We might as well not even tak about this shit no more.
Well I'm talkin' 'bout it. And ain't nobody gon stop me from talkin bout it.
Well talk is cheap... NIGGA!
I know you out of money by now, Cleo. Now what you going to do?
Rob another goddamn bank! What the fuck is ya'll thinkin?

[after Frankie is unexpectedly thrust into a bank robbery while working]
Okay, okay. Let's take this from the top.
I thought we covered everything.
How well did you know the perpetrator?
I've just known Darnell from around the way, is all. We live in the same projects.
Frankie, will you do me a favor? Just tell me one thing, and we'll get out of here.
Sure.
What's the procedure when you're being robbed?
Look, sir, I kn...
Stop! Stop! Stop! Now... what's the procedure when you're being robbed?
You pull the money clip from your right-hand drawer. And then you signal with your left hand.
You signal with the left. So you know the procedure.
Yes, like I said, the procedure has been told to me over a million times.
So, why is it, if that procedure's been drummed into your head a million times... you got that procedure down... Why wouldn't you follow it? Huh?
Because he had a gun! And I went for my clip, but he shot her! He shot her right in front of me!
I'm afraid, Miss Sutton, that we're going to have to let you go. The fact that you knew the perpetrator doesn't sit well with us.
Wait, wait. But that's not right. I haven't done anything wrong! I can't help who I know! Mr. Zachary, just last week, you gave me a promotion. Now you're going to take my job away from me like this?
What happens the next time one of your friends robs the bank? How do we know you're not in collusion?

20 sharp every morning and I work my ass off until quitting time. Yesterday, I counted $240,000 by hand for you! That's how you should KNOW! I mean, COME ON! This is just NOT RIGHT! I nearly got blown away in your tight-ass fucking bank, and you're going to FIRE me? You couldn't even WAIT!

[after Stony gives T.T. her share]
T.T.? She ain't gettin a cut!
Look, Frankie I ain't for your shit tonight all right? T.T. needs it more than any of us.
Look, she didn't do anything. She walked out!
Who the fuck cares? She was there.

[shouts]
No, fuck that! She didn't do nothin' so she ain't gettin nothin!
Forget it! Frankie I don't want your money. Now if you wanna kick my ass then come on let's just get it over with cuz I am sick of your *shit*! I need that money.
It ain't you I'm mad at.
[hands her the money]
Damn, sorry I was trippin.You my girl.

[crying]
I need this.

[sarcastically]
You are so special, Frankie.

[as Cleo grabs her breast, she pushes her away]
Cleo! I done told you! I'm strictly-dickly.

[speaking to Cleo]
See now, I'm gonna tell Ursula.

[makes fist and pretends to hit T.T]
You ain't telling nobody!
[laughs]

[holding up a check]
Look! Did your sister come through for you or what?
Where did you get this?
Don't worry about where I got it from. That ain't none of your business. Just look at the digits!
Look, Stony, there's something I got to tell you.
Look, Stevie, I know this is hardly enough money. But I swear, I will get every...
No, no, listen to me. I didn't get into U.C.L.A., and I'm not going because I didn't get accepted.

[angrily slaps Stevie]
You didn't get IN?
Come on, Stony, don't go off on me now...
DON'T you tell me not to go off on you! Do you have any IDEA what I had to go through? Do you?
I'm not staying around for this.
[moves to leave]

[grabbing Stevie's shirt]
You ARE going to hang around for this, and don't you move. Why did you have to lie to me?
Stony, you know how long you told me that I HAD to go to college? Well, I'm sorry, but maybe that life just isn't for me.
[exits the apartment]
[tears the check into pieces]
[last lines]
Stony, I'm glad you're safe.
I am. Thank you.
What part of "no" don't you understand, Strode? The "N" or the "O"?

[shouts]
What the hell? Cleo, I know you ain't come to work. Ain't been to work and don't call nobody!
I'm broke, Luther! Now I know you gonna give me my old job back cos nobody can take shit the way I take shit. Now shut up before I stick that mop up your ass, Luther.
You better save that for your little girlfriend. Well,
[shouts]
Get to work, ladies... and gentlemen!

[in a romantic tone]
Looking into those beautiful pretty brown eyes... are you cross-eyed?

[smiles]
No, your head is just small!

[laughs]
My head is small?

[laughing]
Yeah, it makes my eyes go this way...

[puts her fingers together near her eyes]
I have to focus in on your little peanut...
Oh, my peanut!
[continues to laugh]
No, I'm just kidding.
[laughs]

[as she punches luther in the hotel]
CLIMB-OUT THE PUSSY LUTHER!
Countin all this money is harder than working for Luther! HA HA HA!

[refering to the cassette tapes]
Shit,
[looks at another one]
Shit,
[trows them out the car]

[tells stony]
Pass me a tape.
Lets go Cleo.

[whining]
I aint goin' no where 'til you pass me a tape!

[throws her a tape]
TAKE THAT SHIT, LETS GO!

[referring to Cleo's car]
Cleo... when are you going to fix this raggity shit?
Never mind my shit, fool!
[gives him the finger]
Frankie, I heard about what happened at the bank the other day. Keep your head up, girl, all right?
[Frankie nods in response]
All right.

[staring at Cleo]
Yeah, UP, UP, UP!
[makes his low-rider bounce higher and higher]
